title: Game just says( Game still in progress) But will not join game
body: Would like maybe some one from riot to say there is a prob with this as its 3rd or so time this has happened and then you get slapped with a Que time dodge :S

replies.body:
üëãüèΩ Heya!

I'd advise not playing games for now to avoid being slapped with a queue dodge timer or even a LeaverBuster penalty. This is due to the recent anti-cheat update that came with Patch 8.15. Riot is aware and is likely working on a fix.

Got the same issue. Have tried literally everything. 
Seems to be happening to a lot of other players but there is no word from Riot at all.
